issue.title: DeletingPods  With no errors ... for several hours

content.raw: Can you please do some “profiling” \(not necessarily now, Urban?\) how long it takes to launch pods, run the simulation and delete pods? For example robotika/ver24s02x2/dc160a49-1296-4306-aa29-4b4d440faa55-r-1 is in the state `DeletingPods With no errors` since 6am and now we have 1pm → 7 hours! … yes, I am very anxious to get the very first results … sorry :wink:
content.html: Can you please do some “profiling” (not necessarily now, Urban?) how long it takes to launch pods, run the simulation and delete pods? For example robotika/ver24s02x2/dc160a49-1296-4306-aa29-4b4d440faa55-r-1 is in the state DeletingPods With no errors since 6am and now we have 1pm → 7 hours! … yes, I am very anxious to get the very first results … sorry
